law.full_text:
PRELOADING CONFERENCE.
Prior to starting pumps for transfer operations, the Master or the responsible tank vessel officer and the Terminal Superintendent shall confer together to determine that all requirements have been met for safe transfer operations aboard the vessel and on the terminal premises.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
PRELOADING CONFERENCE. (§ 57.95.26)
PRELOADING CONFERENCE. Prior to starting pumps for transfer operations, the Master or the responsible tank vessel officer and the Terminal Superintendent shall confer together to determine that all requirements have been met for safe transfer operations aboard the vessel and on the terminal premises.

PRELOADING CONFERENCE.

Prior to starting pumps for transfer operations, the Master or the responsible tank vessel officer and the Terminal Superintendent shall confer together to determine that all requirements have been met for safe transfer operations aboard the vessel and on the terminal premises.
